Uses of Class
mainPackage.Game

  • Packages that use Game 
    Package Description
    mainPackage
    Regroups main classes of the game
    players
    Contains classes of players and their related classes or interfaces, such as Strategy and Effect.

    • Uses of Game in mainPackage

      Methods in mainPackage that return Game 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Game Game.getInstance​()
      static method called instead of the constructor, to assure that the class Game is instantiated only once.
      Methods in mainPackage with parameters of type Game 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Round.startPlaying​(Game game)
      Call the method to roll out the game only if it has not been called already.
      Constructors in mainPackage with parameters of type Game 
      Constructor Description
      Round​(boolean direction, Game game)
      Instantiation of the class.

    • Uses of Game in players

      Methods in players with parameters of type Game 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Effect.draw1Card​(Game game)
      Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 1 to his count of cards to take
      void Player.draw1Card​(Game game)  
      void Effect.draw3Card​(Game game)
      Affects a penalty to the next player, by adding 3 to his count of cards to take
      void Player.draw3Card​(Game game)  
      boolean Effect.executeEffect​(Card card_to_play, Game game)
      Verifies if the card has an effect affected, and if so, execute this effect.
      boolean Player.executeEffect​(Card card_to_play, Game game)  
      void AI.play​(Game game)
      Makes the AI pick cards as penalty if necessary, makes it choose witch card to play and if it wants to say card.
      void PhysicalPlayer.play​(Game game)
      Makes the physical player pick cards as penalty if necessary, makes it choose witch card to play and if it wants to say card.
      void Player.play​(Game game)
      Defines how the player's behavior and how he will play.
      boolean AI.playCard​(Card card_to_play, Game game)
      Makes the AI play a card, and calls the method executeEffect to execute the effect possibly associated.
      boolean PhysicalPlayer.playCard​(Card card_to_play, Game game)
      Allows the physical player to play a card, and calls the method executeEffect to execute the effect possibly associated.
      void Strategy.strategy​(Game game)  
      void StrategyEasy.strategy​(Game game)
      Provides a method，looking for the cards this AI can play from his hand，once he finds the card, he plays it.
      void StrategyHard.strategy​(Game game)
      Provide a method，looking for the cards.
